definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Less the amount of meat, mainly to satisfy their craving.
sentences.chinese: 肉食的量要少，以解饞爲主。

sentences.english: Could there be a substance that both gives us the munchies and can help combat obesity?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有什麼東西既能爲我們解饞又有助於減肥呢？

sentences.english: And don’t forget cinnamon hard candy.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了重肉桂糖果，1到2塊就足夠解饞了。

sentences.english: Find a healthy snack food you can keep with you and use in place of cigarettes to quench that urge for oral gratification.
sentences.chinese: 找一種健康的零食來隨身攜帶，來代替香菸解饞。

definition: to eat one's fill/to be full
to eat and eat/to stuff oneself
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
dilettante/amateur/to dabble in/to flirt with (a topic)
to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
